challenges.title: Q1: Simple Hello Page
challenges.description: Create an HTML page with a proper skeleton that displays a main heading 'Welcome to HTML' and a paragraph saying 'This is my first HTML page.'
challenges.outputDescription: Browser should show a heading and a paragraph.
examples: The page title (on the tab) should be 'My First Page'.
challenges.starterCode:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <title>My First Page</title>
</head>
<body>
    <!-- Add your h1 and p here -->
</body>
</html>

challenges.title: Q2: Multiple Headings
challenges.description: Create a page with three headings: an <h1> main title, an <h2> subtitle, and an <h3> small heading. Add at least one paragraph under them.
challenges.outputDescription: Page shows a clear heading hierarchy and a paragraph.
challenges.starterCode:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <title>Headings Demo</title>
</head>
<body>
    <!-- Add h1, h2, h3 and a paragraph -->
</body>
</html>
